meanings.definition: To get back or regain possession of something.
meanings.sent1: She reobtained her lost necklace from the lost and found.
meanings.sent2: After losing his wallet, he reobtained it from the security office.
meanings.sent3: The cat reobtained its favorite toy after it was hidden under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The sun reobtained its brightness after the storm clouds passed.
meanings.sent5: The student reobtained his focus after taking a short break.

meanings.definition: To acquire or recover something that was previously owned or possessed.
meanings.sent1: He reobtained his childhood toy from the attic.
meanings.sent2: The company reobtained its former glory after restructuring.
meanings.sent3: The magician reobtained the missing card from behind his ear.
meanings.sent4: The athlete reobtained his strength after a period of rest.
meanings.sent5: The artist reobtained her inspiration after visiting a museum.
